title: DAOKit Event Contract
description: Canonical event record emitted on every state transition and verification action.

schema_version.description: Contract version for backward-safe event parsing.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for this concrete event record.

task_id.description: Task identifier associated with the emitted event.

run_id.description: Run identifier associated with the emitted event.

step_id.description: Step identifier for step-scoped events, null for global events.

event_type.description: Typed event category used by replay and diagnostics.

severity.description: Event severity level used for escalation and alerting.

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp at which the event was emitted.

payload.description: Structured event payload for diagnostics and deterministic replay.

dedup_key.description: Optional deduplication key for once-per-streak emissions.
